stories.title: View Employee List
stories.description: As a user, I want to view the list of employees so that I can manage their details.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the employee management page is open, When I view the table, Then it should display employee details including First Name, Last Name, Age, Email, Salary, and Department.

stories.title: Add New Employee
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new employee so that they are included in the records.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the employee list page is open, When I click the 'Add' button, Then a form should appear to enter new employee details.

stories.title: Search Employees
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for an employee so that I can quickly find their information.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the employee list is visible, When I type in the search bar, Then the list should filter to display matching employee records.

stories.title: Edit Employee Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit an employee's details so that I can update their information.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the employee list is visible, When I click the edit icon next to an employee, Then a form should appear with their current details for editing.

stories.title: Delete Employee Record
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete an employee record so that it is removed from the records.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the employee list is visible, When I click the delete icon next to an employee, Then they should be removed from the list after confirmation.
